movies.name: Master
movies.stars: Joseph Vijay, Vijay Sethupathi, Malavika Mohanan, Arjun Das
movies.summary: An alcoholic professor is sent to a juvenile school, where he clashes with a gangster who uses the school children for criminal activities.

movies.name: Jai Bhim
movies.stars: Suriya, Lijo Mol Jose, Manikandan, Rajisha Vijayan
movies.summary: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

movies.name: Karnan
movies.stars: Dhanush, Lal, Rajisha Vijayan, Yogi Babu
movies.summary: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

movies.name: Doctor
movies.stars: Sivakarthikeyan, Vinay Rai, Priyanka Arulmohan, Yogi Babu
movies.summary: When his fiancee's niece is kidnapped, a stoic army doctor and his motley team launch a rescue operation in which they need both wit and their wits.

movies.name: Maanaadu
movies.stars: T.R. Silambarasan, S.J. Suryah, Kalyani Priyadarshan, S.A. Chandrashekhar
movies.summary: On the day of a public conference by the state's Chief Minister, his bodyguard and a police officer are stuck in a time loop.
